ayah: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: sabbaha lillahi ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: Glorifies [to] Allah whatever (is) in the heavens and the earth and He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

ayah_translit: sabbaha lillahi ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: Glorifies [to] Allah whatever (is) in the heavens and the earth and He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
ayah_translit: lahu mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi yuh'yi wayumitu wahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: For Him (is the) dominion (of) the heavens and the earth He gives life and causes death and He (is) over all things All-Powerful

ayah: لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

ayah: هُوَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُ وَٱلۡأٓخِرُ وَٱلظَّـٰهِرُ وَٱلۡبَاطِنُۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ
ayah_translit: huwa al-awalu wal-akhiru wal-zahiru wal-batinu wahuwa bikulli shayin alimun
ayah_english: He (is) the First and the Last and the Apparent and the Unapparent and He (is) of every thing All-Knower

ayah: هُوَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُ وَٱلۡأٓخِرُ وَٱلظَّـٰهِرُ وَٱلۡبَاطِنُۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ

ayah_translit: huwa al-awalu wal-akhiru wal-zahiru wal-batinu wahuwa bikulli shayin alimun

ayah: هُوَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُ وَٱلۡأٓخِرُ وَٱلظَّـٰهِرُ وَٱلۡبَاطِنُۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ
ayah_translit: huwa al-awalu wal-akhiru wal-zahiru wal-batinu wahuwa bikulli shayin alimun
ayah_english: He (is) the First and the Last and the Apparent and the Unapparent and He (is) of every thing All-Knower

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi ya'lamu ma yaliju fi al-ardi wama yakhruju min'ha wama yanzilu mina al-samai wama ya'ruju fiha wahuwa ma'akum ayna ma kuntum wal-lahu bima ta'maluna basirun
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who created the heavens and the earth in six periods then He rose over the Throne He knows what penetrates in(to) the earth and what comes forth from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein and He (is) with you wherever wherever you are And Allah of what you do (is) All-seer

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

ayah_english: He (is) the One Who created the heavens and the earth in six periods then He rose over the Throne He knows what penetrates in(to) the earth and what comes forth from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein and He (is) with you wherever wherever you are And Allah of what you do (is) All-seer

ayah_translit: huwa alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi ya'lamu ma yaliju fi al-ardi wama yakhruju min'ha wama yanzilu mina al-samai wama ya'ruju fiha wahuwa ma'akum ayna ma kuntum wal-lahu bima ta'maluna basirun

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi ya'lamu ma yaliju fi al-ardi wama yakhruju min'ha wama yanzilu mina al-samai wama ya'ruju fiha wahuwa ma'akum ayna ma kuntum wal-lahu bima ta'maluna basirun
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who created the heavens and the earth in six periods then He rose over the Throne He knows what penetrates in(to) the earth and what comes forth from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein and He (is) with you wherever wherever you are And Allah of what you do (is) All-seer

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi ya'lamu ma yaliju fi al-ardi wama yakhruju min'ha wama yanzilu mina al-samai wama ya'ruju fiha wahuwa ma'akum ayna ma kuntum wal-lahu bima ta'maluna basirun
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who created the heavens and the earth in six periods then He rose over the Throne He knows what penetrates in(to) the earth and what comes forth from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein and He (is) with you wherever wherever you are And Allah of what you do (is) All-seer

ayah: لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ
ayah_translit: lahu mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi wa-ila al-lahi tur'ja'u al-umuru
ayah_english: For Him (is the) dominion (of) the heavens and the earth and to Allah will be returned the matters

ayah: لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

ayah: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayah_translit: yuliju al-layla fi al-nahari wayuliju al-nahara fi al-layli wahuwa alimun bidhati al-suduri
ayah_english: He merges the night into the day and He merges the day into the night and He (is) All-Knower of what is in the breasts of what is in the breasts

ayah: ءَامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَأَنفِقُواْ مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسۡتَخۡلَفِينَ فِيهِۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنكُمۡ وَأَنفَقُواْ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ
ayah_translit: aminu bil-lahi warasulihi wa-anfiqu mimma ja'alakum mus'takhlafina fihi fa-alladhina amanu minkum wa-anfaqu lahum ajrun kabirun
ayah_english: Believe in Allah and His Messenger and spend of what He has made you trustees therein And those who believe among you and spend for them (is) a reward great

ayah: ءَامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَأَنفِقُواْ مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسۡتَخۡلَفِينَ فِيهِۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنكُمۡ وَأَنفَقُواْ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ

ayah: ءَامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَأَنفِقُواْ مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسۡتَخۡلَفِينَ فِيهِۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنكُمۡ وَأَنفَقُواْ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ

ayah: وَمَا لَكُمۡ لَا تُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولُ يَدۡعُوكُمۡ لِتُؤۡمِنُواْ بِرَبِّكُمۡ وَقَدۡ أَخَذَ مِيثَٰقَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wama lakum la tu'minuna bil-lahi wal-rasulu yad'ukum litu'minu birabbikum waqad akhadha mithaqakum in kuntum mu'minina
ayah_english: And what (is) for you (that) not you believe in Allah while the Messenger calls you that you believe in your Lord and indeed He has taken your covenant if you are believers

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ لِّيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi yunazzilu ala abdihi ayatin bayyinatin liyukh'rijakum mina al-zulumati ila al-nuri wa-inna al-laha bikum laraufun rahimun
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who sends down upon His slave Verses clear that He may bring you out from the darkness[es] into the light And indeed Allah to you (is the) Most Kind (the) Most Merciful

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ لِّيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ

ayah_translit: huwa alladhi yunazzilu ala abdihi ayatin bayyinatin liyukh'rijakum mina al-zulumati ila al-nuri wa-inna al-laha bikum laraufun rahimun
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who sends down upon His slave Verses clear that He may bring you out from the darkness[es] into the light And indeed Allah to you (is the) Most Kind (the) Most Merciful
word_tranlation: that He may bring you out

ayah_translit: huwa alladhi yunazzilu ala abdihi ayatin bayyinatin liyukh'rijakum mina al-zulumati ila al-nuri wa-inna al-laha bikum laraufun rahimun
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who sends down upon His slave Verses clear that He may bring you out from the darkness[es] into the light And indeed Allah to you (is the) Most Kind (the) Most Merciful

ayah: وَمَا لَكُمۡ أَلَّا تُنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَٰثُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ لَا يَسۡتَوِي مِنكُم مَّنۡ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبۡلِ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ وَقَٰتَلَۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنفَقُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَقَٰتَلُواْۚ وَكُلّٗا وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ
ayah_translit: wama lakum alla tunfiqu fi sabili al-lahi walillahi mirathu al-samawati wal-ardi la yastawi minkum man anfaqa min qabli al-fathi waqatala ulaika a'zamu darajatan mina alladhina anfaqu min ba'du waqatalu wakullan wa'ada al-lahu al-hus'na wal-lahu bima ta'maluna khabirun
ayah_english: And what (is) for you that not you spend in (the) way (of) Allah while for Allah (is the) heritage (of) the heavens and the earth Not are equal among you (those) who spent before before the victory and fought Those (are) greater (in) degree than those who spent afterwards afterwards and fought But to all Allah has promised Allah has promised the best And Allah of what you do (is) All-Aware

ayah: وَمَا لَكُمۡ أَلَّا تُنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَٰثُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ لَا يَسۡتَوِي مِنكُم مَّنۡ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبۡلِ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ وَقَٰتَلَۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنفَقُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَقَٰتَلُواْۚ وَكُلّٗا وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ

ayah: وَمَا لَكُمۡ أَلَّا تُنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَٰثُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ لَا يَسۡتَوِي مِنكُم مَّنۡ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبۡلِ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ وَقَٰتَلَۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنفَقُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَقَٰتَلُواْۚ وَكُلّٗا وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ

ayah: وَمَا لَكُمۡ أَلَّا تُنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَٰثُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ لَا يَسۡتَوِي مِنكُم مَّنۡ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبۡلِ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ وَقَٰتَلَۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنفَقُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَقَٰتَلُواْۚ وَكُلّٗا وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ
ayah_translit: wama lakum alla tunfiqu fi sabili al-lahi walillahi mirathu al-samawati wal-ardi la yastawi minkum man anfaqa min qabli al-fathi waqatala ulaika a'zamu darajatan mina alladhina anfaqu min ba'du waqatalu wakullan wa'ada al-lahu al-hus'na wal-lahu bima ta'maluna khabirun

ayah: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يُقۡرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا فَيُضَٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥ وَلَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ
ayah_translit: man dha alladhi yuq'ridu al-laha qardan hasanan fayuda'ifahu lahu walahu ajrun karimun
ayah_english: Who (is) the one who the one who will loan (to) Allah a loan goodly so He will multiply it for him and for him (is) a reward noble

ayah: يَوۡمَ تَرَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ يَسۡعَىٰ نُورُهُم بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۖ بُشۡرَىٰكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ جَنَّـٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
ayah_translit: yawma tara al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati yas'a nuruhum bayna aydihim wabi-aymanihim bush'rakumu al-yawma jannatun tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha dhalika huwa al-fawzu al-'azimu
ayah_english: (On the) Day you will see the believing men and the believing women running their light before them before them and on their right Glad tidings for you this Day gardens flowing from underneath it the rivers abiding forever therein That [it] (is) the success the great

ayah: يَوۡمَ تَرَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ يَسۡعَىٰ نُورُهُم بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۖ بُشۡرَىٰكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ جَنَّـٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

ayah: يَوۡمَ تَرَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ يَسۡعَىٰ نُورُهُم بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۖ بُشۡرَىٰكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ جَنَّـٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

ayah_english: (On the) Day you will see the believing men and the believing women running their light before them before them and on their right Glad tidings for you this Day gardens flowing from underneath it the rivers abiding forever therein That [it] (is) the success the great

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتُ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱنظُرُونَا نَقۡتَبِسۡ مِن نُّورِكُمۡ قِيلَ ٱرۡجِعُواْ وَرَآءَكُمۡ فَٱلۡتَمِسُواْ نُورٗاۖ فَضُرِبَ بَيۡنَهُم بِسُورٖ لَّهُۥ بَابُۢ بَاطِنُهُۥ فِيهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَةُ وَظَٰهِرُهُۥ مِن قِبَلِهِ ٱلۡعَذَابُ
ayah_translit: yawma yaqulu al-munafiquna wal-munafiqatu lilladhina amanu unzuruna naqtabis min nurikum qila ir'ji'u waraakum fal-tamisu nuran faduriba baynahum bisurin lahu babun batinuhu fihi al-rahmatu wazahiruhu min qibalihi al-'adhabu
ayah_english: (On the) Day will say the hypocrite men and the hypocrite women to those who believed Wait for us we may acquire of your light It will be said Go back behind you and seek light Then will be put up between them a wall for it a gate its interior in it (is) mercy but its exterior facing towards [it] facing towards [it] the punishment

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتُ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱنظُرُونَا نَقۡتَبِسۡ مِن نُّورِكُمۡ قِيلَ ٱرۡجِعُواْ وَرَآءَكُمۡ فَٱلۡتَمِسُواْ نُورٗاۖ فَضُرِبَ بَيۡنَهُم بِسُورٖ لَّهُۥ بَابُۢ بَاطِنُهُۥ فِيهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَةُ وَظَٰهِرُهُۥ مِن قِبَلِهِ ٱلۡعَذَابُ

ayah_translit: yawma yaqulu al-munafiquna wal-munafiqatu lilladhina amanu unzuruna naqtabis min nurikum qila ir'ji'u waraakum fal-tamisu nuran faduriba baynahum bisurin lahu babun batinuhu fihi al-rahmatu wazahiruhu min qibalihi al-'adhabu
ayah_english: (On the) Day will say the hypocrite men and the hypocrite women to those who believed Wait for us we may acquire of your light It will be said Go back behind you and seek light Then will be put up between them a wall for it a gate its interior in it (is) mercy but its exterior facing towards [it] facing towards [it] the punishment

ayah_english: (On the) Day will say the hypocrite men and the hypocrite women to those who believed Wait for us we may acquire of your light It will be said Go back behind you and seek light Then will be put up between them a wall for it a gate its interior in it (is) mercy but its exterior facing towards [it] facing towards [it] the punishment

ayah_translit: yawma yaqulu al-munafiquna wal-munafiqatu lilladhina amanu unzuruna naqtabis min nurikum qila ir'ji'u waraakum fal-tamisu nuran faduriba baynahum bisurin lahu babun batinuhu fihi al-rahmatu wazahiruhu min qibalihi al-'adhabu
ayah_english: (On the) Day will say the hypocrite men and the hypocrite women to those who believed Wait for us we may acquire of your light It will be said Go back behind you and seek light Then will be put up between them a wall for it a gate its interior in it (is) mercy but its exterior facing towards [it] facing towards [it] the punishment

ayah: يُنَادُونَهُمۡ أَلَمۡ نَكُن مَّعَكُمۡۖ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنَّكُمۡ فَتَنتُمۡ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَتَرَبَّصۡتُمۡ وَٱرۡتَبۡتُمۡ وَغَرَّتۡكُمُ ٱلۡأَمَانِيُّ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡغَرُورُ
ayah_translit: yunadunahum alam nakun ma'akum qalu bala walakinnakum fatantum anfusakum watarabbastum wa-ir'tabtum wagharratkumu al-amaniyu hatta jaa amru al-lahi wagharrakum bil-lahi al-gharuru
ayah_english: They will call them Were not we with you They will say Yes but you led to temptation yourselves and you awaited and you doubted and deceived you the wishful thinking until came (the) Command (of) Allah And deceived you about Allah the deceiver

ayah: يُنَادُونَهُمۡ أَلَمۡ نَكُن مَّعَكُمۡۖ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنَّكُمۡ فَتَنتُمۡ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَتَرَبَّصۡتُمۡ وَٱرۡتَبۡتُمۡ وَغَرَّتۡكُمُ ٱلۡأَمَانِيُّ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡغَرُورُ

ayah_english: They will call them Were not we with you They will say Yes but you led to temptation yourselves and you awaited and you doubted and deceived you the wishful thinking until came (the) Command (of) Allah And deceived you about Allah the deceiver

ayah: يُنَادُونَهُمۡ أَلَمۡ نَكُن مَّعَكُمۡۖ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنَّكُمۡ فَتَنتُمۡ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَتَرَبَّصۡتُمۡ وَٱرۡتَبۡتُمۡ وَغَرَّتۡكُمُ ٱلۡأَمَانِيُّ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡغَرُورُ

ayah_english: They will call them Were not we with you They will say Yes but you led to temptation yourselves and you awaited and you doubted and deceived you the wishful thinking until came (the) Command (of) Allah And deceived you about Allah the deceiver

ayah: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُؤۡخَذُ مِنكُمۡ فِدۡيَةٞ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ مَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ هِيَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: fal-yawma la yu'khadhu minkum fid'yatun wala mina alladhina kafaru mawakumu al-naru hiya mawlakum wabi'sa al-masiru
ayah_english: So today not will be accepted from you any ransom and not from those who disbelieved Your abode (is) the Fire it (is) your protector and wretched is the destination

ayah: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُؤۡخَذُ مِنكُمۡ فِدۡيَةٞ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ مَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ هِيَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: fal-yawma la yu'khadhu minkum fid'yatun wala mina alladhina kafaru mawakumu al-naru hiya mawlakum wabi'sa al-masiru
ayah_english: So today not will be accepted from you any ransom and not from those who disbelieved Your abode (is) the Fire it (is) your protector and wretched is the destination

ayah: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُؤۡخَذُ مِنكُمۡ فِدۡيَةٞ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ مَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ هِيَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

ayah: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُؤۡخَذُ مِنكُمۡ فِدۡيَةٞ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ مَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ هِيَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: fal-yawma la yu'khadhu minkum fid'yatun wala mina alladhina kafaru mawakumu al-naru hiya mawlakum wabi'sa al-masiru
ayah_english: So today not will be accepted from you any ransom and not from those who disbelieved Your abode (is) the Fire it (is) your protector and wretched is the destination

ayah: ۞أَلَمۡ يَأۡنِ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَن تَخۡشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمۡ لِذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا يَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَطَالَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَدُ فَقَسَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡۖ وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَٰسِقُونَ
ayah_translit: alam yani lilladhina amanu an takhsha'a qulubuhum lidhik'ri al-lahi wama nazala mina al-haqi wala yakunu ka-alladhina utu al-kitaba min qablu fatala alayhimu al-amadu faqasat qulubuhum wakathirun min'hum fasiquna
ayah_english: Has not come (the) time for those who believed that become humble their hearts at (the) remembrance (of) Allah and what has come down of the truth And not they become like those who were given the Book before before (and) was prolonged for them the term so hardened their hearts and many of them (are) defiantly disobedient

ayah: ۞أَلَمۡ يَأۡنِ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَن تَخۡشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمۡ لِذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا يَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَطَالَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَدُ فَقَسَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡۖ وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَٰسِقُونَ
ayah_translit: alam yani lilladhina amanu an takhsha'a qulubuhum lidhik'ri al-lahi wama nazala mina al-haqi wala yakunu ka-alladhina utu al-kitaba min qablu fatala alayhimu al-amadu faqasat qulubuhum wakathirun min'hum fasiquna
ayah_english: Has not come (the) time for those who believed that become humble their hearts at (the) remembrance (of) Allah and what has come down of the truth And not they become like those who were given the Book before before (and) was prolonged for them the term so hardened their hearts and many of them (are) defiantly disobedient

ayah: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ قَدۡ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: i'lamu anna al-laha yuh'yi al-arda ba'da mawtiha qad bayyanna lakumu al-ayati la'allakum ta'qiluna
ayah_english: Know that Allah gives life (to) the earth after its death Indeed We have made clear to you the Signs so that you may understand

ayah_translit: i'lamu anna al-laha yuh'yi al-arda ba'da mawtiha qad bayyanna lakumu al-ayati la'allakum ta'qiluna
ayah_english: Know that Allah gives life (to) the earth after its death Indeed We have made clear to you the Signs so that you may understand

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَٱلۡمُصَّدِّقَٰتِ وَأَقۡرَضُواْ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا يُضَٰعَفُ لَهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ
ayah_translit: inna al-musadiqina wal-musadiqati wa-aqradu al-laha qardan hasanan yuda'afu lahum walahum ajrun karimun
ayah_english: Indeed the men who give charity and the women who give charity and who lend (to) Allah a loan goodly it will be multiplied for them and for them (is) a reward noble

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَٱلۡمُصَّدِّقَٰتِ وَأَقۡرَضُواْ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا يُضَٰعَفُ لَهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦٓ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصِّدِّيقُونَۖ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرُهُمۡ وَنُورُهُمۡۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina amanu bil-lahi warusulihi ulaika humu al-sidiquna wal-shuhadau inda rabbihim lahum ajruhum wanuruhum wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina ulaika ashabu al-jahimi
ayah_english: And those who believe in Allah and His Messengers [those] they (are) the truthful and the martyrs (are) with their Lord For them (is) their reward and their light But those who disbelieve and deny Our Verses those (are the) companions (of) the Hellfire

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦٓ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصِّدِّيقُونَۖ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرُهُمۡ وَنُورُهُمۡۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦٓ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصِّدِّيقُونَۖ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرُهُمۡ وَنُورُهُمۡۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

ayah_english: And those who believe in Allah and His Messengers [those] they (are) the truthful and the martyrs (are) with their Lord For them (is) their reward and their light But those who disbelieve and deny Our Verses those (are the) companions (of) the Hellfire

ayah: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعِبٞ وَلَهۡوٞ وَزِينَةٞ وَتَفَاخُرُۢ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَتَكَاثُرٞ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰلِ وَٱلۡأَوۡلَٰدِۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيۡثٍ أَعۡجَبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصۡفَرّٗا ثُمَّ يَكُونُ حُطَٰمٗاۖ وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞ وَمَغۡفِرَةٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٞۚ وَمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡغُرُورِ
ayah_translit: i'lamu annama al-hayatu al-dun'ya la'ibun walahwun wazinatun watafakhurun baynakum watakathurun fi al-amwali wal-awladi kamathali ghaythin a'jaba al-kufara nabatuhu thumma yahiju fatarahu mus'farran thumma yakunu hutaman wafi al-akhirati adhabun shadidun wamaghfiratun mina al-lahi warid'wanun wama al-hayatu al-dun'ya illa mata'u al-ghururi
ayah_english: Know that the life (of) the world (is) play and amusement and adornment and boasting among you and competition in increase of the wealth and the children like (the) example (of) a rain pleases the tillers its growth then it dries and you see it turning yellow then becomes debris And in the Hereafter (is) a punishment severe and forgiveness from Allah and Pleasure But not (is) the life (of) the world except (the) enjoyment (of) delusion

ayah: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعِبٞ وَلَهۡوٞ وَزِينَةٞ وَتَفَاخُرُۢ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَتَكَاثُرٞ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰلِ وَٱلۡأَوۡلَٰدِۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيۡثٍ أَعۡجَبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصۡفَرّٗا ثُمَّ يَكُونُ حُطَٰمٗاۖ وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞ وَمَغۡفِرَةٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٞۚ وَمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡغُرُورِ
ayah_translit: i'lamu annama al-hayatu al-dun'ya la'ibun walahwun wazinatun watafakhurun baynakum watakathurun fi al-amwali wal-awladi kamathali ghaythin a'jaba al-kufara nabatuhu thumma yahiju fatarahu mus'farran thumma yakunu hutaman wafi al-akhirati adhabun shadidun wamaghfiratun mina al-lahi warid'wanun wama al-hayatu al-dun'ya illa mata'u al-ghururi

ayah: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعِبٞ وَلَهۡوٞ وَزِينَةٞ وَتَفَاخُرُۢ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَتَكَاثُرٞ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰلِ وَٱلۡأَوۡلَٰدِۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيۡثٍ أَعۡجَبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصۡفَرّٗا ثُمَّ يَكُونُ حُطَٰمٗاۖ وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞ وَمَغۡفِرَةٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٞۚ وَمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡغُرُورِ

ayah: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعِبٞ وَلَهۡوٞ وَزِينَةٞ وَتَفَاخُرُۢ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَتَكَاثُرٞ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰلِ وَٱلۡأَوۡلَٰدِۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيۡثٍ أَعۡجَبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصۡفَرّٗا ثُمَّ يَكُونُ حُطَٰمٗاۖ وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞ وَمَغۡفِرَةٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٞۚ وَمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡغُرُورِ
ayah_translit: i'lamu annama al-hayatu al-dun'ya la'ibun walahwun wazinatun watafakhurun baynakum watakathurun fi al-amwali wal-awladi kamathali ghaythin a'jaba al-kufara nabatuhu thumma yahiju fatarahu mus'farran thumma yakunu hutaman wafi al-akhirati adhabun shadidun wamaghfiratun mina al-lahi warid'wanun wama al-hayatu al-dun'ya illa mata'u al-ghururi
ayah_english: Know that the life (of) the world (is) play and amusement and adornment and boasting among you and competition in increase of the wealth and the children like (the) example (of) a rain pleases the tillers its growth then it dries and you see it turning yellow then becomes debris And in the Hereafter (is) a punishment severe and forgiveness from Allah and Pleasure But not (is) the life (of) the world except (the) enjoyment (of) delusion

ayah: سَابِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَغۡفِرَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرۡضُهَا كَعَرۡضِ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
ayah_translit: sabiqu ila maghfiratin min rabbikum wajannatin arduha ka'ardi al-samai wal-ardi u'iddat lilladhina amanu bil-lahi warusulihi dhalika fadlu al-lahi yu'tihi man yashau wal-lahu dhu al-fadli al-'azimi
ayah_english: Race to (the) forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden its width (is) like (the) width (of) the heaven and the earth prepared for those who believe in Allah and His Messengers That (is the) Bounty (of) Allah He gives (to) whom He wills And Allah (is) the Possessor of Bounty (is) the Possessor of Bounty the Great

ayah: سَابِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَغۡفِرَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرۡضُهَا كَعَرۡضِ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

ayah: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِيٓ أَنفُسِكُمۡ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن نَّبۡرَأَهَآۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ
ayah_translit: ma asaba min musibatin fi al-ardi wala fi anfusikum illa fi kitabin min qabli an nabra-aha inna dhalika ala al-lahi yasirun
ayah_english: Not strikes any disaster in the earth and not in yourselves but in a Register before before that We bring it into existence Indeed that for Allah (is) easy

ayah: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِيٓ أَنفُسِكُمۡ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن نَّبۡرَأَهَآۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ

ayah_english: Not strikes any disaster in the earth and not in yourselves but in a Register before before that We bring it into existence Indeed that for Allah (is) easy

ayah: لِّكَيۡلَا تَأۡسَوۡاْ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَفۡرَحُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالٖ فَخُورٍ
ayah_translit: likayla tasaw ala ma fatakum wala tafrahu bima atakum wal-lahu la yuhibbu kulla mukh'talin fakhurin
ayah_english: So that you may not grieve over what has escaped you and (do) not exult at what He has given you And Allah (does) not love every self-deluded boaster

ayah: لِّكَيۡلَا تَأۡسَوۡاْ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَفۡرَحُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالٖ فَخُورٍ
ayah_translit: likayla tasaw ala ma fatakum wala tafrahu bima atakum wal-lahu la yuhibbu kulla mukh'talin fakhurin
ayah_english: So that you may not grieve over what has escaped you and (do) not exult at what He has given you And Allah (does) not love every self-deluded boaster

ayah: لِّكَيۡلَا تَأۡسَوۡاْ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَفۡرَحُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالٖ فَخُورٍ

ayah_english: So that you may not grieve over what has escaped you and (do) not exult at what He has given you And Allah (does) not love every self-deluded boaster

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يَبۡخَلُونَ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبُخۡلِۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ
ayah_translit: alladhina yabkhaluna wayamuruna al-nasa bil-bukh'li waman yatawalla fa-inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-hamidu
ayah_english: Those who are stingy and enjoin (on) the people stinginess And whoever turns away then indeed Allah He (is) Free of need the Praiseworthy

ayah: لَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلَنَا بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مَعَهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ ٱلنَّاسُ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَأَنزَلۡنَا ٱلۡحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأۡسٞ شَدِيدٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥ وَرُسُلَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ
ayah_translit: laqad arsalna rusulana bil-bayinati wa-anzalna ma'ahumu al-kitaba wal-mizana liyaquma al-nasu bil-qis'ti wa-anzalna al-hadida fihi basun shadidun wamanafi'u lilnnasi waliya'lama al-lahu man yansuruhu warusulahu bil-ghaybi inna al-laha qawiyyun azizun
ayah_english: Certainly We sent Our Messengers with clear proofs and We sent down with them the Scripture and the Balance that may establish the people justice And We sent down [the] iron wherein (is) power mighty and benefits for the people and so that make evident Allah (he) who helps Him and His Messengers unseen Indeed Allah (is) All-Strong All-Mighty

ayah: لَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلَنَا بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مَعَهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ ٱلنَّاسُ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَأَنزَلۡنَا ٱلۡحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأۡسٞ شَدِيدٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥ وَرُسُلَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ

ayah_translit: laqad arsalna rusulana bil-bayinati wa-anzalna ma'ahumu al-kitaba wal-mizana liyaquma al-nasu bil-qis'ti wa-anzalna al-hadida fihi basun shadidun wamanafi'u lilnnasi waliya'lama al-lahu man yansuruhu warusulahu bil-ghaybi inna al-laha qawiyyun azizun

ayah_english: Certainly We sent Our Messengers with clear proofs and We sent down with them the Scripture and the Balance that may establish the people justice And We sent down [the] iron wherein (is) power mighty and benefits for the people and so that make evident Allah (he) who helps Him and His Messengers unseen Indeed Allah (is) All-Strong All-Mighty

ayah: لَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلَنَا بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مَعَهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ ٱلنَّاسُ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَأَنزَلۡنَا ٱلۡحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأۡسٞ شَدِيدٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥ وَرُسُلَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحٗا وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلۡكِتَٰبَۖ فَمِنۡهُم مُّهۡتَدٖۖ وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَٰسِقُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna nuhan wa-ib'rahima waja'alna fi dhurriyyatihima al-nubuwata wal-kitaba famin'hum muh'tadin wakathirun min'hum fasiquna
ayah_english: And certainly We sent Nuh and Ibrahim and We placed in their offspring Prophethood and the Scripture and among them (is) a guided one but most of them (are) defiantly disobediently

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحٗا وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلۡكِتَٰبَۖ فَمِنۡهُم مُّهۡتَدٖۖ وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَٰسِقُونَ

ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna nuhan wa-ib'rahima waja'alna fi dhurriyyatihima al-nubuwata wal-kitaba famin'hum muh'tadin wakathirun min'hum fasiquna
ayah_english: And certainly We sent Nuh and Ibrahim and We placed in their offspring Prophethood and the Scripture and among them (is) a guided one but most of them (are) defiantly disobediently

ayah: ثُمَّ قَفَّيۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم بِرُسُلِنَا وَقَفَّيۡنَا بِعِيسَى ٱبۡنِ مَرۡيَمَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡإِنجِيلَۖ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ رَأۡفَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَرَهۡبَانِيَّةً ٱبۡتَدَعُوهَا مَا كَتَبۡنَٰهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ رِضۡوَٰنِ ٱللَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوۡهَا حَقَّ رِعَايَتِهَاۖ فَـَٔاتَيۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ أَجۡرَهُمۡۖ وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَٰسِقُونَ

ayah: ثُمَّ قَفَّيۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم بِرُسُلِنَا وَقَفَّيۡنَا بِعِيسَى ٱبۡنِ مَرۡيَمَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡإِنجِيلَۖ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ رَأۡفَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَرَهۡبَانِيَّةً ٱبۡتَدَعُوهَا مَا كَتَبۡنَٰهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ رِضۡوَٰنِ ٱللَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوۡهَا حَقَّ رِعَايَتِهَاۖ فَـَٔاتَيۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ أَجۡرَهُمۡۖ وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَٰسِقُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma qaffayna ala atharihim birusulina waqaffayna bi'isa ib'ni maryama waataynahu al-injila waja'alna fi qulubi alladhina ittaba'uhu rafatan warahmatan warahbaniyyatan ib'tada'uha ma katabnaha alayhim illa ib'tighaa rid'wani al-lahi fama ra'awha haqqa ri'ayatiha faatayna alladhina amanu min'hum ajrahum wakathirun min'hum fasiquna

ayah: ثُمَّ قَفَّيۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم بِرُسُلِنَا وَقَفَّيۡنَا بِعِيسَى ٱبۡنِ مَرۡيَمَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡإِنجِيلَۖ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ رَأۡفَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَرَهۡبَانِيَّةً ٱبۡتَدَعُوهَا مَا كَتَبۡنَٰهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ رِضۡوَٰنِ ٱللَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوۡهَا حَقَّ رِعَايَتِهَاۖ فَـَٔاتَيۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ أَجۡرَهُمۡۖ وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَٰسِقُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَءَامِنُواْ بِرَسُولِهِۦ يُؤۡتِكُمۡ كِفۡلَيۡنِ مِن رَّحۡمَتِهِۦ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ نُورٗا تَمۡشُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu al-laha waaminu birasulihi yu'tikum kif'layni min rahmatihi wayaj'al lakum nuran tamshuna bihi wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
ayah_english: O (you who) (O) you who believe Fear Allah and believe in His Messenger He will give you double portion of His Mercy and He will make for you a light you will walk with it and He will forgive you And Allah (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَءَامِنُواْ بِرَسُولِهِۦ يُؤۡتِكُمۡ كِفۡلَيۡنِ مِن رَّحۡمَتِهِۦ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ نُورٗا تَمۡشُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

ayah_english: O (you who) (O) you who believe Fear Allah and believe in His Messenger He will give you double portion of His Mercy and He will make for you a light you will walk with it and He will forgive you And Allah (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: لِّئَلَّا يَعۡلَمَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أَلَّا يَقۡدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ مِّن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡفَضۡلَ بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
ayah_translit: li-alla ya'lama ahlu al-kitabi alla yaqdiruna ala shayin min fadli al-lahi wa-anna al-fadla biyadi al-lahi yu'tihi man yashau wal-lahu dhu al-fadli al-'azimi
ayah_english: So that may know (the) People (of) the Book that not they have power over anything from (the) Bounty (of) Allah and that the Bounty (is) in (Allah's) hand (is) (in) Allah's (hand) He gives it whom He wills And Allah (is) the Possessor of Bounty (is) the Possessor of Bounty the Great

ayah: لِّئَلَّا يَعۡلَمَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أَلَّا يَقۡدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ مِّن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡفَضۡلَ بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
